EmailTemplate.name: Negotiation Request Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: A Negotiation Request for {!NegotiationRequest__c.ProgramName__c} has been submitted for approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User, A negotiation request for {!NegotiationRequest__c.ProgramName__c} has been submitted for your approval. Please follow the link below to review and submit it.
Click here
Sincerely,
UtahGrants Support Team
